## Node.clone() function

Creates a new `Shadow` instance with the same value as the original and deeply referentially non-equal. Optionally replaces child elements based on a predicate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
function clone(node: Shadow, options?: ElementReplacementOptions, device?: Device): Shadow;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  node | Shadow |  |
|  options | [ElementReplacementOptions](./alfa-dom.node.elementreplacementoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ |
|  device | Device | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

Shadow

## Remarks

The clone will have the same `externalId` as the original. The clone will \*not\* get `extraData` from the original, instead it will be `undefined`<!-- -->.
